Condition.description: This parameter enables you to limit the permission to accounts that fulfill a certain condition, such as being a member of a certain AWS organization.

Value.description: Specifies the key for the condition. Currently the only supported key is aws:PrincipalOrgID.
Value.markdownDescription:
Specifies the key for the condition. Currently the only supported key is aws:PrincipalOrgID.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Type.description: Specifies the type of condition. Currently the only supported value is StringEquals.
Type.markdownDescription:
Specifies the type of condition. Currently the only supported value is StringEquals.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.description: Specifies the value for the key. Currently, this must be the ID of the organization.
Key.markdownDescription:
Specifies the value for the key. Currently, this must be the ID of the organization.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Condition.markdownDescription:
This parameter enables you to limit the permission to accounts that fulfill a certain condition, such as being a member of a certain AWS organization.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

EventBusName.description: The name of the event bus associated with the rule. If you omit this, the default event bus is used.
EventBusName.markdownDescription:
The name of the event bus associated with the rule. If you omit this, the default event bus is used.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: [\.\-_A-Za-z0-9]+  
Update requires: Replacement

Action.description: The action that you are enabling the other account to perform.
Action.markdownDescription:
The action that you are enabling the other account to perform.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: events:[a-zA-Z]+  
Update requires: No interruption

StatementId.description: An identifier string for the external account that you are granting permissions to
StatementId.markdownDescription:
An identifier string for the external account that you are granting permissions to

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9-_]+  
Update requires: Replacement

Statement.description: A JSON string that describes the permission policy statement. You can include a Policy parameter in the request instead of using the StatementId, Action, Principal, or Condition parameters.
Statement.markdownDescription:
A JSON string that describes the permission policy statement. You can include a Policy parameter in the request instead of using the StatementId, Action, Principal, or Condition parameters.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Principal.description: The 12-digit AWS account ID that you are permitting to put events to your default event bus. Specify "*" to permit any account to put events to your default event bus.
Principal.markdownDescription:
The 12-digit AWS account ID that you are permitting to put events to your default event bus. Specify "*" to permit any account to put events to your default event bus.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 12  
Pattern: (\d{12}|\*)  
Update requires: No interruption
